title: NYC Buildings Commissioner’s Phone Seized in Criminal Gambling Probe
description: Eric Ulrich, 37, a former councilman from Queens, was questioned Tuesday by investigators from the Manhattan district attorney’s office.
dc:creator: William K. Rashbaum, Jonah E. Bromwich and Jeffery C. Mays
media:credit: Stephanie Keith for The New York Times
media:description: Eric Ulrich, the city buildings commissioner, was a Republican city councilman until this year.
